  window.plpData = {
    data: {},
    listenerList: [],
    getSearchPath: function getSearchPath(newFacetList) {
      return searchPathPromise.then(function (getSearchPath) {
        return getSearchPath(newFacetList);
      });
    },
    listen: function listen(cb) {
      if (this.receivedAction) {
        cb(this.data);
      }
      this.listenerList.push(cb);
    },
    setData: function setData(data) {
      var _this = this;
      this.receivedAction = true;
      this.data = data;
      this.listenerList.forEach(function (cb) {
        cb(_this.data);
      });
    },
    unlisten: function unlisten(cb) {
      var index = this.listenerList.indexOf(cb);
      this.listenerList.splice(index, 1);
    }
  };
  var searchPathPromise = new Promise(function (resolve) {
    window.plpData.resolveGetSearchPath = resolve;
  });
})();</script>

		<script>
		(function() {
			const scriptMap = {}
			const moduleMap = {}
			const importMap = {}

			window.loadScript = function(url, {
				type = 'import',
				fallbackUrl,
				resolveValue,
				scriptAttributes
			}) {
				let map = scriptMap;
				let attributes = { defer: true };

				if (type !== 'script') {
					if ('noModule' in HTMLScriptElement.prototype) {
						map = type === 'import' ? importMap : moduleMap;
						attributes = { type: 'module' };
					} else if (fallbackUrl) {
						url = fallbackUrl;
					} else {
						return Promise.reject(new Error('type not supported and fallback not given'))
					}
				}

				let promise;

				if (url in map) {
					promise = map[url];
				} else {
					promise = new Promise(resolve => {
						const script = document.createElement('script');

						if (scriptAttributes) {
							Object.assign(attributes, scriptAttributes);
						}

						Object.keys(attributes).forEach((key, _) => {
							if (attributes[key] === false) {
								script.removeAttribute(key);
							} else {
								script.setAttribute(key, attributes[key] === true ? '' : attributes[key].toString());
							}
						})

						script.onload = () => resolve(undefined);
						script.src = url;

						document.head.appendChild(script);
					});

					map[url] = promise;
				}

				if (resolveValue) {
					return promise.then(() => resolveValue)
				}

				return promise;
			}
		})();

tabindex="-1">Top Deals details:</h2><div style="line-height:14px;font-size:" class="mc-tb-bodycopy mc-tb-bodycopy-l"><div class="bodycopy inline disclaimer font-weight-normal v-text-tech-black">Prices and offers represent BestBuy.com pricing and are subject to change. Product quantities are limited. Rainchecks are not available. In-store pricing may vary. <a href="/site/top-deals/terms-conditions-top-deals/pcmcat1563549567856.c?id=pcmcat1563549567856" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=Learn more about Top Deals,linkRegion=SEO Text Block,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">Learn more about Top Deals</a>.</div></div></div></span></div></div></div></div></div></div><div data-testid="row" class="mc-row row mb-300"><div class="mc-column col-xs-12 px-200"><div id="mc-widget-ce1b13a7-3190-476d-b811-73b8c5f1753f" class="mc-widget widget-textblock isSingleWidget"><div class="mc-text-block border"><div class="flex border-b p-200" data-testid="text-block-type"><h2 class="heading mc-tb-header heading-5" id="mc-tb-header-ce1b13a7-3190-476d-b811-73b8c5f1753f" tabindex="-1">Exploring cell phone deals</h2><a class="col-xs v-text-human-blue mt-50 text-right" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock]" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" aria-describedby="mc-tb-header-ce1b13a7-3190-476d-b811-73b8c5f1753f"></a></div><div class="row ml-none mr-none mb-200 pb-50 pt-50"><div class="col-xs-6 mc-tb-column mb-100 false px-200 false false"><span><div class="mc-tb-section"><h3 class="heading mc-tb-sec-header heading-6  mb-50 block mt-200" id="mc-tb-sub-header-a28ad0c4-0379-4362-b1dd-fb7ef61b2372-0" tabindex="-1"><strong>Finding the best cell phone deal for you</strong></h3><div style="line-height:;font-size:" class="mc-tb-bodycopy mc-tb-bodycopy-l"><div class="bodycopy inline"><p>When it comes to looking at phones for sale and discovering the best cell phone deals, it’s not just about finding the cheapest cell phone you can get. It’s also about finding a phone deal that meets your needs for both service and function. Start by evaluating which <a href="https://www.bestbuy.com/site/electronics/mobile-cell-phones/abcat0800000.c?id=abcat0800000" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=smartphone,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">smartphone</a> features are important to you, whether that’s screen size, resolution, camera capabilities, software features, battery life and more.</p><p>Perhaps you’re an <a href="https://www.bestbuy.com/site/brands/apple/pcmcat128500050005.c?id=pcmcat128500050005" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=Apple,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">Apple</a> user looking for an iPhone deal that’ll give you a discount on the latest <a href="https://www.bestbuy.com/site/mobile-cell-phones/iphone/pcmcat305200050000.c?id=pcmcat305200050000" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=iPhone,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">iPhone</a> model along with <a href="https://www.bestbuy.com/site/services/applecare/pcmcat748300453862.c?id=pcmcat748300453862" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=AppleCare+,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">AppleCare+</a> protection. Maybe you’re a fan of <a href="https://www.bestbuy.com/site/brands/samsung-store/pcmcat140800050115.c?id=pcmcat140800050115" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=Samsung,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">Samsung</a> and want the newest Samsung Galaxy with a qualifying <a href="https://tradein.bestbuy.com/catalog/product-families/samsung-products" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=Galaxy trade-in,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">Galaxy trade-in</a>. There are usually many cell phone deals to choose from, so keep your priorities aligned with what is available.</p><p>You can find phone deals for yourself or for the whole family. If you travel often, it might be a good idea to look into unlocked cell phone deals. <a href="https://www.bestbuy.com/site/mobile-cell-phones/unlocked-mobile-phones/pcmcat156400050037.c?id=pcmcat156400050037" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=Unlocked cell phones,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">Unlocked cell phones</a> give you the flexibility to switch between different carriers and use international <a href="https://www.bestbuy.com/site/mobile-phone-accessories/sim-cards/pcmcat265100050014.c?id=pcmcat265100050014" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=SIM cards,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">SIM cards</a>, allowing you to avoid expensive roaming charges when traveling abroad.</p></div></div></div></span></div><div class="col-xs-6 mc-tb-column mb-100 false px-200 false false"><span><div class="mc-tb-section"><h3 class="heading mc-tb-sec-header heading-6  mb-50 block mt-200" id="mc-tb-sub-header-a28ad0c4-0379-4362-b1dd-fb7ef61b2372-1" tabindex="-1"><strong>Getting the most out of your phone deal</strong></h3><div style="line-height:;font-size:" class="mc-tb-bodycopy mc-tb-bodycopy-l"><div class="bodycopy inline"><p>You’ve found the perfect smartphone deal for you–now it’s time to start protecting your investment. To help maintain a like-new appearance, get a <a href="https://www.bestbuy.com/site/mobile-phone-accessories/surface-screen-protectors/pcmcat171900050031.c?id=pcmcat171900050031" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=screen protector,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">screen protector</a> to fight off fingerprints and scratches. If you want to add a fun and original touch while helping keep your phone safe, don’t forget about a <a href="https://www.bestbuy.com/site/mobile-phone-accessories/cases-covers-clips/abcat0811006.c?id=abcat0811006" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=cell phone case,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">cell phone case</a>. And, make sure you have a <a href="https://www.bestbuy.com/site/mobile-phone-accessories/cell-phone-chargers-cables/abcat0811004.c?id=abcat0811004" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=phone charger,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">phone charger</a> on hand to be sure your cell phone is always ready to go when you are.</p><p>Do you enjoy photography? Learn <a href="https://www.bestbuy.com/discover-learn/how-to-take-amazing-pictures-with-your-smartphone/pcmcat1637936509070" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=how to take amazing pictures with your smartphone,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">how to take amazing pictures with your smartphone</a> and see how your device can serve as a versatile tool for capturing memories and expressing your creativity. Then, if you want to share physical prints of your work, look into <a href="https://www.bestbuy.com/discover-learn/how-to-print-photos-from-your-phone/pcmcat1637769126251" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=how to print photos from your phone,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">how to print photos from your phone</a> so you can easily turn your digital memories into tangible keepsakes.</p><p>Ultimately, getting the most out of your cell phone deal depends on how you’ll use your <a href="https://www.bestbuy.com/site/mobile-cell-phones/all-cell-phones/pcmcat1625163553254.c?id=pcmcat1625163553254" data-track="[context:widgetType=textBlock,linkContent=cell phone,linkRegion=SEO Text Block Setup,linkPlacement=c1w1a1]">cell phone</a> and what features are most important to you. Whether you’re maximizing your phone’s potential to enhance your productivity, connectivity or entertainment experience, the best cell phone deal will let you enjoy all the benefits that modern technology has to offer.</p></div></div></div></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><script type="application/json" id="bestbuy-mc-renderer-844416-json">{"app":{"instanceId":"bestbuy-mc-renderer-844416","nodeId":"1727975859049","deviceClass":"l","piscesBaseUrl":"https:\u002F\u002Fpisces.bbystatic.com","valuePropUrl":"https:\u002F\u002Fpromos.bestbuy.com\u002FYZxH?af_web_dp=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fsite%2Fmisc%2Fmobile-app%2Fpcmcat208500050016.c%3Fid%3Dpcmcat208500050016&af_xp=custom&pid=dotcom&c=SV_Discover_Tab_App_Download_Embedded_Button&is_retargeting=true&af_reengagement_window=30d&af_dp=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2F&deep_link_value=bestbuy%3A%2F%2Fdiscover","environment":"production","rows":[{"columns":[{"widgets":[{"hTag":"2","widgetType":"textBlock","tags":{},"assets":[{"analyticsContext":"textBlock_r1c1w1a1","content":{"_meta":{"ignoreOnSmall":{},"guid":"32f90cdb-a61d-4c56-8017-001323f66cb9"},"openLink":"sameTab","openDisclaimer":"inModal","ref-type":"experience-fragment","object-key":"0ecc6eec-3f6b-4b01-bfbd-14c5e801db18","guid":"5b6c31aa-bc7e-4f6f-811f-8931555513a1","name":"top-deals_Top_Deals_Disclaimer_All_Pages","module":[{"paragraphText":"Prices and offers represent BestBuy.com pricing and are subject to change.
